nl_prompt: Create a website for a AI Chatbot product introduction.

function.description: Display a brief overview of the AI Chatbot's capabilities and benefits.
Showcase the main features of the AI Chatbot.
Display different pricing plans and subscription options.
Provide a form to contact the sales team for customized solutions. This function should be in the same page with pricing.
Show information about the company and team behind the AI Chatbot.
Provide answers to frequently asked questions about the AI Chatbot.
Offer a form for users needing assistance. This function should be with FAQ in the same page.

function.test:
def test_read_product_overview(driver, test_url, overview_text_id):
    driver.get(test_url)
    overview_text = driver.find_element(By.ID, overview_text_id)
    assert overview_text.is_displayed()

parameter.name: test_url
parameter.description: the url for test

parameter.name: overview_text_id
parameter.description: the component id of the product overview text

function.test:
def test_list_key_features(driver, link_id, features_list_id):
    driver.find_element(By.ID, link_id).click()
    features_list = driver.find_element(By.ID, features_list_id)
    assert features_list.is_displayed()

parameter.name: link_id
parameter.description: the link component id for redirecting features page in the homepage

parameter.name: features_list_id
parameter.description: the component id of the key features list

parameter.name: back_home_id
parameter.description: The component id of hyperlink that link to the homepage

function.test:
def test_view_pricing_plans(driver, link_id, pricing_table_id):
    driver.find_element(By.ID, link_id).click()
    pricing_table = driver.find_element(By.ID, pricing_table_id)
    assert pricing_table.is_displayed()

parameter.name: link_id
parameter.description: the link component id for redirecting pricing page in the homepage

parameter.name: pricing_table_id
parameter.description: the component id of the pricing table

function.test:
def test_contact_sales(driver, contact_form_id, name_input_name, email_input_name, message_input_name, submit_button_id):
    contact_form = driver.find_element(By.ID, contact_form_id)
    name_input = driver.find_element(By.NAME, name_input_name)
    name_input.send_keys("Tester")
    email_input = driver.find_element(By.NAME, email_input_name)
    email_input.send_keys("example@example.com")
    message_input = driver.find_element(By.NAME, message_input_name)
    message_input.send_keys("Message Test")
    driver.find_element(By.ID, submit_button_id).click()

parameter.name: contact_form_id
parameter.description: the component id of the contact form

parameter.name: name_input_name
parameter.description: the name attribute of the name input field

parameter.name: email_input_name
parameter.description: the name attribute of the email input field

parameter.name: submit_button_id
parameter.description: the component id of submitting the form

parameter.name: message_input_name
parameter.description: the name attribute of the message input field

parameter.name: back_id
parameter.description: The component id of hyperlink that link to the lastpage

parameter.name: back_home_id
parameter.description: The component id of hyperlink that link to the homepage

    contact_form = driver.find_element(By.ID, contact_form_id)

    issue_input = driver.find_element(By.NAME, issue_input_name)
    issue_input.send_keys("Message Test")
    driver.find_element(By.ID, submit_button_id).click()
